meaning: n. fango, bardoma, barro, cieno, enruna, légamo, limo, lodo, pecina, reboño, tarquín; lodazal, atascadero, atolladero, atranco, atranque, barrero, barrial, barrizal, cenagal, ciénaga, fangal, fangarv. enlodar, enlodazar
